The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 08 August is 59,564 (6,865.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 03 August, there were 2,331 new confirmed cases (268.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 July, there were 2,226 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 5% (105 extra cases).
